message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start
I appreciate your fairness, but I believe a 60-40 split in my favor is more equitable. Let's see if you agree.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to compromise a bit, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
Let's be realistic, inflation is affecting both of us. I'm willing to go down to 65%, but I need a larger share to make this worthwhile. This is my final offer.
I understand we're both losing value, but I still think my initial fairness holds. Meeting you halfway between our last offers.

This is my final offer. With each round passing, the value of the money decreases significantly. I'm willing to give you a share, but I need a majority to make this worth it for me. Accept this, or we risk losing everything.
